title: Homeric Hymns To Aphrodite 19-21

title: Homeric Hymns To Aphrodite 19-20

title: Homeric Hymns To Aphrodite 19-20

title: Homeric Hymns To Aphrodite 19
body: analysis of use of agōn to indicate that the context of the performance of the Hymns is a seasonally recurring festival

title: Homeric Hymns To Aphrodite 196-197
body: comparison with Iliadic references to the future of the lineages of Aeneas on the one hand and Hector and Priam on the other, in the context of the analysis of Poseidon’s prophecy about the future of the Aeneadae as lasting forever in the Iliad

title: Homeric Hymns To Aphrodite 196-197
body: comment on the Aeolian links with Aeneas as helping account for traces of Aeolian traditions in the wording of the prophecy about Aeneas here
